did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, publications, printed material, and manuscripts.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, publications in various languages, unpublished papers, curriculum vitae, and unpublished articles concerning economics, economic planning, urban planning and development, and socio-economics.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Leo H. Klaassen (also known as Leonardus Klaassen) was Vice President and later President of the Regional Science Association.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, publications in various languages, unpublished papers, curriculum vitae, and unpublished articles concerning economics, economic planning, urban planning and development, and socio-economics.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Leo H. Klaassen papers, #4093. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of two boxes. Online guide unavailable.
